mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sj_job_summary (namespace_id, group_name, business_id, trigger_at, system_task_type, success_num,fail_num,fail_reason,stop_num,stop_reason, cancel_num,cancel_reason) VALUES
( #{item.namespaceId}, #{item.groupName}, #{item.businessId}, #{item.triggerAt}, #{item.systemTaskType}, #{item.successNum}, #{item.failNum}, #{item.failReason}, #{item.stopNum}, #{item.stopReason}, #{item.cancelNum}, #{item.cancelReason} )
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(trigger_at, #{dateFormat}) AS createDt, COALESCE(SUM(success_num), 0) AS success, COALESCE(SUM(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, COALESCE(SUM(stop_num), 0) AS stop, COALESCE(SUM(cancel_num), 0) AS cancel, COALESCE(SUM(fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS fail, COALESCE(SUM(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS total FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY createDt

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(success_num), 0) AS successNum, COALESCE(SUM(stop_num), 0) AS stopNum, COALESCE(SUM(cancel_num), 0) AS cancelNum, COALESCE(SUM(fail_num), 0) AS failNum, COALESCE(SUM(success_num + fail_num + stop_num + cancel_num), 0) AS totalNum FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT
CONCAT(group_name, '/', (SELECT job_name FROM sj_job WHERE id = business_id)) AS name,
CONCAT(group_name, '/', (SELECT workflow_name FROM sj_workflow WHERE id = business_id)) AS name,
SUM(fail_num) AS total FROM sj_job_summary ${ew.customSqlSegment} HAVING SUM(fail_num) > 0 ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 10
